name: Rōnin Dasher
description:
Story

You are a roaming samurai after losing your daimyo in the battle of Sekigahara. Now you search for revenge on the fearsome forces of Tokugawa Ieyasu for killing you master.

Move around and try to destroy as many soldiers as possible!

Controls
  • W - Move Forward
  • LMB - Charge Attack
  • Look around with the mouse
